thread.title: These are the droids you're looking for: Star Wars R2-D2, Darth Vader shower heads released - Fun
thread.title_full: These are the droids you're looking for: Star Wars R2-D2, Darth Vader shower heads released - Fun News - Digital Spy

author: Harry Fletcher
title: These are the droids you're looking for: Star Wars R2-D2, Darth Vader shower heads released - Fun
text: These are definitely the droids you're looking for - Star Wars fans can now feel the full force of their shower with these brilliant R2-D2 and Darth Vader showerheads.The awesome accessories are great if you fancy adding a touch of Star Wars magic to your morning routine. © bedbathandbeyond.comStar Wars R2-D2 showerhead The showerheads are currently available for £17.12-£20.55 from Bed, Bath and Beyond.The accessories aren't the only cool items of Star Wars merchandise to emerge recently, after a group of new Lego toys may have given some tantalising glimpses into the upcoming film. © bedbathandbeyond.comStar Wars Darth Vader showerhead Everything we know about Star Wars: The Force Awakens, including trailers, cast, release date and spoilersElsewhere, the run time for the upcoming Star Wars: The Force Awakens has been revealed, with the film clocking in at 2 hours and 16 minutes (136 minutes).Star Wars: The Force Awakens is released in UK cinemas on December 17, and in the US on December 18.
